title: Bandwidth: GeForce Now celebrates its second anniversary as GTA 6 becomes a reality
content:
As cloud gaming continues its expansion, GeForce Now is celebrating the two year anniversary of its rebirth.

description: Nvidia is celebrating the second anniversary of its GeForce Now platform with new games, rewards, and more as other cloud gaming news drops.
